::Shadow Wing/ Spears::

Shadow Wing:: 
She dodged the shots from the optics, but had rockets  to contend 
with. She dodged two of the rockets and watched them collide in 
midair.  But one followed her.  She swooped down and circled around.  
She led the rocket back Anubis.  She headed right for Anubis, then 
turned straight upward letting the rocket home in on Anubis.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Spears::
She transformed into best mode and curled up just as the rocket hit.  
It threw her against the hull of the ship. She laned on the ground in 
a ball of half broken quills.  She got up on all fours and threw some 
of the broken quills at Hades.  "Broken but still sharp." 
She was cut and had damage, but she was still able to fight.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Koga Shuko/Ramhorn/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:
> 
> 
> 
> Imprisoner went flying back, slamming through a tree, not moving.
> 
> 
> Predator ducked under the blast, firing a grenade off at Firearm's 
chest, two 
> optic blasts streaking out at his left knee.
> 
> Choran cursed, taking out his rapid-firing laser rifle, firing off 
16 rapid 
> laser blasts at Rex's pelvis.
> 
> ====
> 
> Koga Shuko stepped into the open, revealing Ramhorn as a 
hostage.  "Back off! 
>  Or the Maximal gets it!" he yells.
> 
> Anubis yelps, rocks hitting him.  WIth a swipe of his hand, he 
knocked away 
> the quills, firing off a blast from his rocket launcher at Shadow 
Wing, as 
> well as three blue optic blasts at her left leg.
> 
> Hades yelled, a quill stabbing into his shoulder.  Raising his 
missile 
> launcher, he fired a rocket off at Spear's abdomen.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron entered the control room, spotting Teletran-1.  Walking up 
to the 
> computer, he smiled.  "With the Ark in ruins, this is the last 
piece of 
> equipment that needs be destroyed." Reaching into subspace, he took 
out two 
> charges.  Setting both on Teletran-1.  He then too out two 
grenades, getting 
> to the doorway, throwing them, one in the middle of Teletran-1's 
charges, the 
> other hitting Teletran-2.  The grenade set off the charges on 
Teletran-1.
> 
> Unitron ran for where Koga Shuko was, chuckling.
